items.content_html: This ToDo App showcases modern web development with Remix for efficient SSR and routing, Prisma for type-safe database management, SQLite for a lightweight database, and TailwindCSS for elegant, responsive design. It highlights robust coding practices and a clean UI.
items.title: yeab14/remix-todoapp: This ToDo App showcases modern web development with Remix for efficient SSR and routing, Prisma for type-safe database management, SQLite for a lightweight database, and TailwindCSS for elegant, responsive design. It highlights robust coding practices and a clean UI.

items.content_html: Snaply is a lightweight, high-performance JavaScript utility toolkit designed for developers who need to streamline their code with simple, fast, and reusable functions. Whether you're working with arrays, objects, or strings, Snaply helps you tackle everyday tasks with ease and efficiency.

Whether you're working with arrays, objects, or strings, Snaply helps you tackle everyday tasks with ease and efficiency.
